creditline: Gift of Laeh and Bernard Solomon Raskas
description: robe with buttons; bell sleeves with brown waves and circles in reds at hems; lower edge decorated with brown wave-topped area filled with leaf, fruit and other organic designs and Hebrew characters in pinks, reds and purples; brown circles below; tan body
dimension: 45 7/8 x 54 3/8 in. (116.52 x 138.11 cm) (sleeve measurement at widest point)
object_name: Robe, from a three-piece High Holy Day costume
title: Robe, from a three-piece High Holy Day costume
